name: Footprints Festival

config_properties.name: Footprints Festival
config_properties.description: A curated discovery festival at TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, showcasing emerging international artists across diverse genres.

ai_profile:
**Footprints Festival 2026: A Celebration of Diversity and Innovation**

The Footprints Festival 2026 lineup showcases a vibrant tapestry of global sounds and genres, featuring 11 artists from 10 different countries. With acts hailing from Germany, Nigeria, Brazil, Iran, and more, this year’s festival is a true celebration of cultural diversity. From the hypnotic beats of electronic music to the rich textures of Malian desert blues and the timeless allure of Anatolian rock, the festival promises an eclectic journey across musical traditions. Notably, 64% of the lineup features artists of color, further emphasizing its commitment to inclusivity and representation.

Genres are equally diverse, with a balanced mix of innovative styles including psychedelic, jazz, indie pop, and experimental sounds. This year also welcomes unique expressions like minimalist electropop, traditional Iranian music, and Armenian folk. The festival captures the spirit of creative fusion, providing a platform for both modern and traditional art forms to coexist and thrive.

With an average artist rating of 7.73 and 100% of the artists boasting Spotify profiles, this year’s lineup has been carefully curated for quality and accessibility. While the majority of performers are male, the inclusion of female and mixed-gender acts highlights a step toward gender balance. Footprints Festival 2026 continues to push boundaries, offering a rich and inclusive musical experience that resonates with audiences from all walks of life.
